virtues.comment: THIS DICT DOES NOTHING - it's purely here for quick reference of some possible virtues, you are not constrained to using these nor should you use these lists
prev_lead_virtues: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: m_c leaves to speak with the Dark Forest. They close their eyes and are immediately surrounded by their loved ones, friends, and Clanmates who have passed on. Murk and shadows cling to their pelts like frost, and their eyes gleam dangerously as they greet the new leader.

As m_c dreams that night, they find themselves walking through darkness, mud and muck sticking to their paws. The world around them is devoid of light and bare branches claw at the empty sky above. A single, foreboding cat sits within a clearing.

m_c leaves to speak with the Dark Forest. They close their eyes and awaken under an oppressing darkness, devoid of the stars they left behind. They turn around to see a shadowy group of cats approaching, triumph in their eyes.

life_giving.text: The cat stands and stalks towards m_c, circling them as though a hunter appraising their next meal. "You come here, ignorant to the lands you walk, expecting a gift? A boon? You'll all wallow here in the darkness with me one day," the cat's eyes pierce into m_c's pelt, "You'll remember me as r_c, and you'll remember that I've granted you a life for [virtue]. And one day, we'll speak again."
virtue: brutality in the face of opposition

life_giving.text: From the muck and mire the distorted shadows of long dead cats rise and loom. Red eyes pierce the haze and a choking hiss grates across the clearing, "Kindly spirit's eyes have left you, so we come to grant your remaining lives. Do with them what you will," before the shadows are gone as quickly as they appeared.

Despite looking quite out of place among the battle-hardened shadows, r_c still places their muzzle harshly against the new leader's head. They give a life for [virtue], hoping that they will remember their own kindness.

r_c stalks up to the new leader, eyes burning with the increasingly familiar Dark Forest ferocity. They touch their nose to m_c's head, giving them a life for [virtue]. m_c reels back with the emotion of the life that courses through them.
r_c walks up to m_c next, offering a life for [virtue]. They smile, and state that the Clan will do well under m_c's leadership.
Another cat approaches. r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c grits their teeth as the life rushes into them.
r_c dips their head in greeting. Energy surges through m_c's pelt as they receive a life for [virtue]. They reassure m_c that they are almost done.
r_c walks up to m_c next, giving them a life for [virtue]. They pause, then shake their head, heading back into the ranks of StarClan.
Another cat approaches. r_c steps forward to give m_c a life for [virtue]. m_c yowls in pain as the life rushes into them.
r_c approaches. Pain surges through m_c's pelt as they receive a life for [virtue]. r_c watches dispassionately.'
r_c bounds up to the new leader, reaching up on their hind legs to give them a new life for [virtue]. They flick their tail and head back to make room for the next cat.
r_c hesitantly approaches the new leader, reaching up on their hind legs to give them a new life for [virtue]. They lash their tail and head back to make room for the next cat.
A young cat is next to give a life. Starlight reflects off their youthful eyes. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].
A young cat is next to give a life. They hesitate, before an older cat nudges them forward, whispering something in their ear. r_c stretches up to give a life for [virtue].
r_c strides forward, an energy in their steps that wasn't present in their last moments. They give a life for [virtue].
r_c pads forward with a wary expression. They give a life for [virtue].
r_c approaches next, a warm smile on their face. They offer a life for [virtue], whispering to take care of the Clan the best they can.
r_c approaches next, a blank expression on their face. They offer a life for [virtue], whispering to not lose their way.
Finally, r_c steps forward. There is pride in their gaze as they stare into m_c's eyes. They give a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: Finally, r_c steps forward. There is a conflicted expression on their face when they step forward and stare into m_c's eyes. They give a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: Finally, r_c steps forward. There is a conflicted expression on their face when they step forward and stare into m_c's eyes. They give a life for [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

life_giving.text: r_c, one of StarClan's oldest leaders, looks at the new leader with a conflicted expression. They give a last life, the gift of [virtue].
virtue: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace
the strength to overcome their fears

text: r_c hails m_c by their new name, m_c_star, telling them that their old pathetic life is no more. They are granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use their new power however they wish. The group of shadowy cats yowls m_c_star's name in support. m_c_star wakes up feeling a new strength within their body and know that they are now ready to lead the Clan.
m_c_star wakes, a hissing echo of their new name lingering in the air.

r_c hails m_c by their new name, m_c_star, telling them that their old pathetic life is no more. They are granted guardianship of c_n, and are told to use their new power however they wish. The Dark Forest's hissing and yowls echo in the dusky clearing as the new leader begins to wake up. m_c_star stands, feeling a new strength within their body, and grins.
